title: Authors and Citation
text: Lifshitz (2022). babynamesIL: Israel Baby Names 1948-2021. https://github.com/aviezerl/babynamesIL, https://aviezerl.github.io/babynamesIL/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {babynamesIL: Israel Baby Names 1948-2021},   author = {Aviezer Lifshitz},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/aviezerl/babynamesIL, https://aviezerl.github.io/babynamesIL/}, }

title: Israel Baby Names 1948-2021
text: babynamesIL contains dataset names given Israeli babies years 1948-2021. data downloaded Israeli Bureau Statistics (LAMAS). names used least 5 children least one gender sector (“Jewish”, “Muslim”, “Christian”, “Druze” “”) included. following objects available: babynamesIL: year 1948 2021, number babies sex sector given name. babynamesIL_totals: dataframe total number babies names per sex sector.

title: Israel Baby Names 1948-2021
code: # Install the released version from CRAN install.packages("babynamesIL")  # Install the development version from GitHub devtools::install_github("aviezerl/babynamesIL")

title: Israel Baby Names 1948-2021
code: library(babynamesIL) head(babynamesIL) #> # A tibble: 6 x 7 #>   sector year sex name   n       prop total #> 1 Jewish 1948   F  שרה 326 0.05002302 45059 #> 2 Jewish 1948   F  רחל 323 0.04956268 46301 #> 3 Jewish 1948   F אסתר 263 0.04035599 44657 #> 4 Jewish 1948   F  חנה 247 0.03790087 35905 #> 5 Jewish 1948   F מרים 190 0.02915452 34343 #> 6 Jewish 1948   F  רות 165 0.02531840 23764 head(babynamesIL_totals) #> # A tibble: 6 x 4 #>   sector sex name total #> 1 Jewish   F נועה 47398 #> 2 Jewish   F  רחל 46301 #> 3 Jewish   F  יעל 45329 #> 4 Jewish   F  שרה 45059 #> 5 Jewish   F מיכל 44945 #> 6 Jewish   F אסתר 44657

what: Israeli baby names per year. — babynamesIL
title: Israeli baby names per year. — babynamesIL
text: Full baby name data provided Israel's Central Bureau Statistics (LAMAS). names least 5 uses (given year) included. Data seperated sectors sex, sectors "Jewish", "Muslim", "Christian", "Druze" "".

title: Israeli baby names per year. — babynamesIL
Israeli baby names per year. — babynamesIL
text: data frame six variables: sector, year, sex, name, n prop (n divided total number babies database).

title: Israeli baby names per year. — babynamesIL

title: Israeli baby names total numbers. — babynamesIL_totals
text: Total number babies per name, sector gender years 1948-2021.

title: Israeli baby names total numbers. — babynamesIL_totals
Israeli baby names total numbers. — babynamesIL_totals
text: data frame 4 variables: sector, sex, name, n.
